original_text:
I will cause your multitude to fall by the swords of mighty ones, all of them most ruthless of nations.
“They shall bring to ruin the pride of Egypt,
    and all its multitude shall perish.
korean_text: 나는 네 무리가 용사 곧 모든 나라의 무서운 자들의 칼에 엎드러지게 할 것임이여 그들이 애굽의 교만을 폐하며 그 모든 무리를 멸하리로다

sentences.original_text: I will cause your multitude to fall
by the swords of mighty ones
all of them most ruthless of nations
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모두 나라 중에 가장 잔인한 자들이다

sentences.original_text: They shall bring to ruin the pride of Egypt
and all its multitude shall perish
